mapper.insert: insert into bmember(BID, BPW, BNAME, STORENAME, STORELOGO1, STORELOGO2, STOREINTRO, STOREPH, STOREZIPCODE, STOREADDR) values (#{bid}, #{bpw}, #{bname}, #{storename}, #{bid}, #{bid}, #{storeintro}, #{storeph}, #{storezipcode}, #{storeAddr})
mapper.update: UPDATE bmember SET STORELOGO1 = #{storelogo1}, storeLogo2 = #{storelogo2} WHERE storename = #{storename}
mapper.insert: insert into cmember(cid, cpw, cname, cph, czipcode, caddr, cardnumber, bank, expirationdate) values (#{cid}, #{cpw}, #{name}, #{ph}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{cardnumber}, #{bank}, #{expirationdate})
